description: This file defines a Flutter widget called PortfolioTab, which represents a UI screen for displaying and interacting with a user's investment portfolio. It includes sections such as portfolio summary, account linking, wealth growth simulation, and holdings list. The widget manages user input for simulation and interacts with a provider for state management.

classes.description: A stateful widget representing the portfolio screen in a Flutter app.

classes.description: The state class for PortfolioTab, managing UI state and interactions.
